node.display_name: Rugged Ridge All Terrain Cargo Liners
node.long_desc: Rugged Ridge Floor Liners are made of high pressure injection molded OE-quality Thermoplastic that looks and feels like rubber, but provides a nonslip surface that will not fade in the sun;Rugged Ridge Cargo Liners have a deep chevron tread patter and raised lip retaining edges around their perimeter of your floor board to keep the spills and mess off your vehicle's carpets;Custom fit and easy to remove and clean, simply hose them off and go!;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge Cargo Liners are made of high pressure injection molded OE-quality Thermoplastic that looks and feels like rubber, but provides a nonslip surface. They will not fade in the sun and our proprietary material is resistant to oil, gas and battery acid. Rugged Ridge Floor Liners take advantage of factory floor hooks and have nibs on the back of the liners help keep the liner in place. Spills ultimately will happen and your feet drag dirt, mud, snow or water into your vehicle. Without a way to contain the spills or corosive material your shoes pick up the mess makes it to the door sill and eventually the carpet. Rugged Ridge Cargo Liners have a raised lip retaining edges around their perimeter of your floor board to keep the spills and mess off your vehicle's carpet. Rugged Ridge Cargo Liners Deep Tread technology with chevron shaped pattern are custom fitted for your vehicle. They are designed to compliment your vehicle and are available in Black, Grey and Tan to match almost any vehicle interior. Easy to remove and clean, simply hose them off and go! Rugged Ridge Cargo Liners are guaranteed to weather the elements and climate and are backed by their lifetime warranty

node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge provides the most comprehensive replacement Fender Flare program on the market today. Covering model years starting in 1955 until current, Rugged Ridge has you covered when it is time to replace or upgrade your Factory Fender Flares. Each flare is constructed of virtually indestructible, durable, UV treated thermoplastic to provide years of service. This special UV Treatment prevents the flare from turning that un-sightly gray chalky color. Each replacement flare is designed to fit into your factory mounting holes (some models may require some hole relocation) for ease of installation. *Will NOT fit Sahara models.

With over 11 cubic feet of extra storage space this is a perfect alternative for expensive plastic pods. No-drilling required - attaches with heavy duty polypropylene straps to your existing roof rack.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Cold Air Intake Kits
node.long_desc: Polished mandrel bent 6063 aluminum air intake tube;Simple no-drill installation bolts on using simple hand tools;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Want more horsepower, better throttle response, and improved acceleration? A Rugged Ridge Air Intake System can boost your performance, while helping you keep extra cash in your wallet. Our polished aluminum mandrel bent intake tube replaces the restrictive factory air box to help improve fuel economy and performance. A black powder coated heat shield separates the filter from engine heat, dirt and debris, as cold air is drawn through a high-flow conical air filter. Unlike other reusable air filters, our dry panel design never needs oiling, which keeps your air flow sensor from being damaged by excess oil! The simple bolt on installation gives you power you can feel, adding up to 10HP and 12ft lbs or torque, depending on application.

node.display_name: Bd Diesel TorqLoc Torque Converter Control Systems
node.long_desc: TorqLoc; Prevents Slippage; Prevents High Oil Temperatures; For Dodge; Ford 7.3L; Chevy 6.5T;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Contemporary torque converters have two modes: fluid coupling or inchunlocked inch mode, and inchlocked inch mode when the internal clutch is engaged and 100% of the engine's power is transferred through the converter. The AutoLoc maintains lock-up when the exhaust brake is activated ensuring that 100% of the retarding force is being transferred in 3rd and 4th gears, preventing slippage and subsequent high oil temperatures. The TorqLoc with its three position switch allows for manual command of the lock-up as well as AutoLoc and stock operations.

node.sales_desc: Rightline Gear specializes in making Duffle Bags that attach to the outside of the vehicle. Choose a large size Duffle Bag or a smaller size Duffle Bag to best fit your load requirement. Duffle Bags can attach to roof top cargo baskets, hitch racks, roof tops, cargo areas, and truck beds. Please see the set up guide for each bag to determine the attachment method for the chosen application. The Rightline Gear 4x4 Duffle Bags feature a plastic insert to provide increased structure and stability when picking up the bags by the handles at each end. Carry your gear on or in your vehicle, knowing that it will stay dry and dust free. The Rightline Gear Cargo Saddlebag is a patented product that attaches to the rear of an SUV or minivan, WITH or WITHOUT a roof rack. The 100% waterproof Saddlebag allows for easy access to your gear and is 100% aerodynamic to save on gas over roof top carriers. The Cargo Saddlebag has a handle on each side so that it can be carried right off of the vehicle into your destination.

node.long_desc: Valve Construction:Cast Aluminum;Activation:Electrical;Overspeed Protection:Yes;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Some industries such as mining, oil refinery, forestry, mobile welding, septic removal and refueling require some vehicles to have an emergency engine shutdown in place. The most effective method for this is to cut the air supply to the Diesel engine ensuring fuel ignition to cease. With BD?s Positive Air Shutdown (PAS), an inline butterfly valve is placed in the air intake line and when activated by its heavy duty electrical solenoid, the engine will shutdown within seconds.

node.long_desc: Manual transmission;Rubber;Easy installation?just slip the pad onto the brake pedal;Weather-resistant;Direct replacement for proper fit;Pedal pads can also be used on clutch (where applicable);California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: BD torque converters feature our own billet aluminum stator that multiplies torque at a lower rpm than the stock converter for more efficient operation, less heat and better fuel economy. Each BD-engineered torque converter features a stamp-forged steel front cover, furnace-brazed fins, and up to triple the amount of lock-up clutch material. For maximum effort applications exceeding 600 rear wheel horsepower, BD now offers the new TorqForce Dodge five-disc and Chevy Duramax three-disc clutch torque converters. Perfect for racing or heavy towing, the TorqForce features smooth lock-up clutch engagement thanks to BD's exclusive CNC-machined billet aluminum stator.

node.sales_desc: Replace stock shackles with Currie Enterprises heavy duty units that feature 1/4in. thick steel side plates, Energy Suspension fluted urethane bushings, and heavy duty greasable bolts that feature zerk fittings on their heads for greasing of the bushings. Finished in corrosion proof gold zinc, these also have bolt-in center braces for added rigidity.

node.long_desc: Bestop's Traditional Jeep Bikini Top provides coverage from the sun to both driver and passenger;Attaches to windshield header and to footman loops in rear body tub;Traditional Bikini Top for Jeep is made from premium fabric that keeps its shape in any temperature;Reinforced edges and industrial grade webbing helps to minimize flapping while driving;Perfect for a doors-off open air rides on the trails or just around town;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Traditional Bikini has classic old school styling using modern materials. Attaches to rear of vehicle via tie-down straps.Bestop invented the Bikini top and has been making them for over 50 years. They're still the favorite for good weather off road adventures. This bikini uses the stock windshield retainer, has long straps that attach at the back of the vehicle and has 2 snaps, one on each side of the windshield retainer. All mounting hardware is also included. This covers the drivers compartment only and connects to the footman loops in the rear of vehicle.

Very retro, and it gets the job done

node.long_desc: The contoured, precise fit of the Bestop Cargo Liner assures complete coverage and stay-in-place stability;Rear cargo liners accommodate seat belts if those were original equipment;Superior TPE material outperforms cheaper liners and mats in extreme conditions;Tall 5/16 inch treads minimize slip, raised edge lip and deep channels keep mud, snow and water contained and off of your Jeep's carpets;The Bestop Rear Cargo liners are made for Jeepers who really understand that their rig can get dirty.Backed by Bestop's lifetime limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: For most any Jeep owner who really understands the type of dirt and debris that makes it into the cargo area. It can be a jungle back there and our Cargo Area Liners are the protection you need. Custom-molded to fit exactly into place in the vehicle, these liners keep the mess from spoiling your carpeted floor. Just take them out, hose them down, and your ready for the next ride.

node.long_desc: 1980-2002 CJ's and Wranglers can use Bestop's Strapless-style Jeep Bikini top that fits with two-piece windshield channel;Header-style Wrangler Bikini top recommended for 97-02 models;Some minor drilling may be required using 2-piece channels;The Bestop Strapless Style Bikini Top for Jeep attaches to the center sports bar for a fitted, clean look;Premium fabric maintains its shape in any temperature, is mildew-resistant, resists UV fading;High strength thread at all stress points ensures durable Bikini top construction;Industrial-grade webbing helps minimize flapping;Heavy-duty composite buckles and fittings for a long life CJ, TJ, YJ, and JK Bikini Top;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bikini Tops are the perfect companion to top-off, doors-off open air rides on the trails or just around town. This Bikini top style provides shade over the front seats for you, a co-driver or Fido.

node.display_name: Trail Gear Transfer Case Skid Plate Kit
node.long_desc: Serious off-road protection for your transfer case and exhaust. Heavy duty design takes impacts and directs the force up to the frame, away from expensive drive train components. Skid plate is made from 3/16 inch plate steel and attaches to the frame via 1.5 inch .120 tubing. Bolt on installation utilizing existing threaded mounting points on the frame. Protects both the transfer case and the exhaust crossover tube. Item is shipped raw and lightly oiled to prevent rust. We recommend that you paint or powder coat before installing.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Serious off-road protection for your transfer case and exhaust. Heavy duty design takes impacts and directs the force up to the frame, away from expensive drive train components. Protects both the transfer case and the exhaust crossover tube. Item is shipped raw and lightly oiled to prevent rust. We recommend that you paint or powder coat before installing.

node.long_desc: Trail-Gear O.D. Tube Clamps are ideal for suspension and steering brackets that you need attached to a section of tubing when you don?t want to weld the bracket directly to the tubing because adjustment or frequent removal of the bracket is needed. The O.D. Tube Clamp is perfect for attaching shock brackets to suspension link or steering brackets to steering rods or links and allows you to attach steel mounting brackets that are readily available to aluminum suspension links and steering rods that you could not otherwise weld steel brackets to. Manufactured from 1020 steel, with a clamping force of up to 8,600lbs these tube clamps will not fail even under the most extreme circumstances. Sold Individually.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Trail Gear's Twin Stick Shifters allow independent control of the high/low and 2wd/4wd sections of your transfer case. This allows access to low range 2wd operation. It also allows you to shift in and out of 4wd while driving on the trail without the need to stop. Access to 2wd low range allows easier steering and less driveline binding when you are traveling between obstacles on the trail with a locked front axle.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Trail Gear's Twin Stick Shifters allow independent control of the high/low and 2wd/4wd sections of your transfer case. This allows access to low range 2wd operation. node.long_desc: Synthetic winch line is expensive to replace so it is important to protect your line and make it last as long as possible. We at Trail-Gear understand that, so we developed a stainless steel tube thimble that will protect your line and keep it from twisting and fraying at the ends. Our tube thimble is easy to install. Simply cut your line down a few inches until you have a new clean piece of line, push the line through the thimble and then braid the line so that the thimble is in place.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Synthetic winch line is expensive to replace so it is important to protect your line and make it last as long as possible. We at Trail-Gear understand that, so we developed a stainless steel tube thimble that will protect your line and keep it from twisting and fraying at the ends. Our tube thimble is easy to install. Simply cut your line down a few inches until you have a new clean piece of line, push the line through the thimble and then braid the line so that the thimble is in place.

node.display_name: Trail Gear Trunnion Bearing Eliminator Kit
node.long_desc: Anyone who wheels hard, rock crawls, or rock races has experienced blown up trunnion bearings, no matter what size bearings they are using, the bearing is always the point of failure. The Rock Assault Trunnion Bearing Eliminator Kit from Trail Gear totally eliminates the failure prone bearings and replaces it with a solid king pin style pin that sits in a hardened bushing. The pin and bushing are made out of a material that is considered bearing quality because of its high carbon content, which gives it extreme hardness. To make sure these pins provide you with smooth steering we have added zerk grease fittings and machined the pins with grease passages and grooves so that they can easily be lubricated without any disassembly of the steering knuckle.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Anyone who wheels hard, rock crawls, or rock races has experienced blown up trunnion bearings, no matter what size bearings they are using, the bearing is always the point of failure. The Rock Assault Trunnion Bearing Eliminator Kit from Trail Gear totally eliminates the failure prone bearings and replaces it with a solid king pin style pin that sits in a hardened bushing. The pin and bushing are made out of a material that is considered bearing quality because of its high carbon content, which gives it extreme hardness. To make sure these pins provide you with smooth steering we have added zerk grease fittings and machined the pins with grease passages and grooves so that they can easily be lubricated without any disassembly of the steering knuckle.

node.long_desc: If you?re looking at building your own front bumper, one of our winch mount plates will make a great starting point. These winch mount plates bolt on in the factory frame holes, and are made from CNC bent 1/4 inch steel plate. We built them with two inch receiver tubing so that you can use a receiver shackle for a pull point or a recovery point. We also predrilled holes for easy winch mounting. If you can bend tube this winch mount plate is all you need to build a great custom bumper. Note: Some winches may require slight trimming or clearancing of the grill.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.sales_desc: The TeraFlex FlexArm joint rebuild kit includes all required replacement components to rebuild a TeraFlex FlexArm joint. Depending on vehicle driving condtions, grit, grime, dust and fluids all take their toll on the tolerances of the bushings. To keep the joint functioning correctly it is necessary to rebuild the joint periodically and restore the joint to top working condition. This kit includes a chrome plated misalignment ball, two urethane bushings, large retainer washer, and snap ring.

node.display_name: TeraFlex Control Arm Sport Bracket Kits
node.long_desc: Driver side front control arm Sport bracket ;Passenger side front control arm Sport bracket ;Front control arm bracket spacers ;All necessary hardware
node.sales_desc: Front Control Arm Sport Brackets are a must to correct caster angles and restore factory geometry on Jeep Wrangler with a 2.5-4.5 coil spring lift kit. Additionally, these Sport Brackets improve overall ride quality resulting in a smoother ride."

node.display_name: TeraFlex Long Arm Bracket Lift Kits
node.long_desc: These CAD-designed TeraFlex Long Flexarm Brackets have been engineered for maximum strength;Use with TeraFlex Alpine Long Flexarms to optimize correct caster and pinion angles;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TeraFlex Elite LCG bracket kit with long FlexArms features CAD designed bracketry that has been specifically engineered to provide maximum strength. Streamlined mounting points incorporate both upper and lower mounts in one bracket for simplified installation and seamless factory styling. This kit includes all Elite LCG frame brackets, and all necessary hardware. Removal of the factory control arm bracketry and welding is required. Fits all JK Wrangler models including Rubicon and Unlimited

node.sales_desc: Upgrade from a lower short arm kit to the TJ LCG lower long flexarm kit. The heavy duty brackety is CNC laser cut from 1/4 steel and precision bent for accurate fitment. The brackets locate using the factory belly pan skidplate bolt holes and are then stitch welded to the frame for final installation. This upgrade includes two frame brakects, two lower long flexarms, and all necessary hardware. Additional modifications are required including cutting and welding."

node.sales_desc: One of the more distinguished lines of custom wheels in the industry, Diamo wheels are everything you could ask for in a car or truck wheel. If you are needing wheels for your Escalade, Expedition, or Navigator, these rims should be able to accomodate your truck rim needs. Hubcentric Ring included where applicable.

node.long_desc: Number of Power Level Settings:Vehicle Dependant;Select Power Level On The Fly:Yes;Rev Limiter Adjustment:Yes;Top SpeedAdjustment: Yes;InternetUpdatable:Yes; Monitor:Yes;Automatic Transmission Adjustment:Yes;Approximate Power Gains:Varies by vehicle;High Resolution 320x240 Full Color Touch Screen;Virtual Gauges-customize your own gauge layout;Virtual Dragstrip-computes 1/4 mile, 1/8 mile, 0-60, and 0-100 track times; State Legal: 49 State; inchIn California, this part may not be used upon a highway and may only be used for race purposes inch;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The DiabloSport Trinity is one of the most advanced tuning devices in the market. With the capability to tune, log and record data, display and customize virtual gauges, read and clear trouble codes. and even compute multiple track times the DiabloSport Trinity is the answer to all of your EFI tuning needs. Trinity supports all vehicle application under a single part number which means you have the option to tune multiple vehicles with only one Trinity (Only 1 vehicle can be tuned at any given time). With a high resolution color touch screen, state of the art graphics/GUI, and the ability to customize gauge layouts the Trinity enhances the interior of any vehicle. node.sales_desc: BD's exchange valve bodies are modified, tuned and tested to provide optimum performance in towing and performance applications. These units feature revised valve design, new springs, larger oil ports and proprietary governor piston dimensions. Hand-lapped surfaces prevent internal leakage, while new trim valves increase mainline pressure. The end result is improved shift quality, increased clutch holding capacity, reduced friction and extended transmission life. What's more, BD's Dodge valve bodies allow for second gear lock-up-a great feature for slowing heavy loads down steep grades (TowLoc/TorqLoc required). Add longevity and performance to your transmission, while making your truck fun to drive.

node.sales_desc: Whether for everyday or emergency use, today?s vehicles are loaded with more electronics than would have been imaginable just a few years ago. ODYSSEY batteries have been designed to keep up with the changes. Because their plates are made of pure virgin lead (unlike the lead alloy in most batteries), we can pack in more plates. And more plates mean more plate surface area, and much more power ? twice the overall power and three times the life of conventional batteries ? up to 400 cycles at 80% depth of discharge!

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 35 to 40 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 24 inch diameter;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The all-new Trail Grappler M/T blends some of the off-road performance of the Mud Grappler with the on-road comfort of the Terra Grappler to create a tire that is both aggressive and quiet. For off-road performance, the sidewall combines a 3-ply high turn-up construction with a thick rubber compound that cushions the tire and helps prevent punctures. On the tread surface, the blocks are configured to provide additional biting edges that command lateral stability and enhance forward traction. For on-road comfort, Nitto?s engineers used advanced sound analysis equipment to reduce the noise levels commonly associated with off-road tires. The internal construction and tread design also help optimize tread life. Two wide steel belts provide a stable base for the tire and increase tread strength. This advanced construction provides optimal uniformity and reduces irregular wear.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 29 to 37 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 17 to 22 inch diameter;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Terra Grappler G2 is Nittos next generation all-terrain light truck tire specifically designed to meet your everyday on and off-road adventures. Whether you are commuting to work, towing a trailer or headed up to your favorite mountain trail; the balanced off-road and on-road performance of the Terra Grappler G2 will get you to your destination. Through the introduction of new materials, Nitto was able to maintain the versatile all-terrain compound while increasing the longevity of the treadwear. For the first time Nitto is backing an all-terrain product with a limited treadwear warranty which covers 50,000 miles for LT-metric and floatation sizes, and 65,000 miles for hard metric sizes. Nitto decided to reinforce the coupling joints in the Terra Grappler G2, which connects the outer most tread blocks to the center blocks, to increase the block edge rigidity. Terra Grappler G2 is equipped with full depth siping. Not only do the full depth sipes offer a functional benefit, it helps maintain the appearance of the tread design as the tire wears. The staggered shoulder lugs on the Terra Grappler G2 provides additional biting edges in off-road conditions. The computer analyzed tread block arrangement reduces tire noise normally heard at highway driving speeds. The Terra Grappler G2 features two distinct and bold sidewall designs. One side features homage to the original Terra Grappler design by incorporating a similar thunderbolt pattern which has been raised to give it a more aggressive look than its predecessor. The other side features a brand new aggressive blade design which features integrated sidewall lugs that run all the way from the shoulder tread block down to the sidewall.

node.long_desc: 5 second cranking power;Fast charge;Spill and leak proof;vibration resistance;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Powersport vehicles need a powerful battery that?s built to take the constant pounding that comes with the territory, whether it's is on land, sea, or snow. The ODYSSEY battery can handle it. Featuring rugged construction and packed tightly with pure lead plates, the non-spillable AGM design ODYSSEY battery protects against the shock and vibration that can quickly destroy other batteries. And the pure lead plates mean more power?twice the overall power and three times the life of conventional batteries?up to 400 cycles at 80% depth of discharge!

node.sales_desc: DiabloSport's number one goal is to make it easy to upgrade vehicle performance with their new inTune i2 performance tuner. It's an easy way to boost your car or trucks power without even popping the hood! If you've ever wished you could buy a performance upgrade that makes the throttle more responsive, optimizes shift patterns, or even adds some bottom-end horsepower, you're in luck- the i2 tuner is loaded with cutting edge performance programs and vehicle adjustments that optimize performance.

node.long_desc: Catches all oil spillover;100% sealed;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The DiabloSport Catch Can is exactly what it sounds like, a small can which is installed under your hood and is designed to inchcatch inch any oil spillover before it enters into your intake manifold. Eliminate all of that oil being transferred into your intake manifold through the factory PCV system decreasing the horsepower, torque, performance and life span of your vehicle. The DiabloSport Catch Can is easily installed and immediately inchcatches inch all of that engine oil before it can be transferred into one of your vehicle's most important components, the intake manifold. Oil deposited in the manifold will drip into the combustion chamber causing an increased chance of spark knock. The DiabloSport Catch Can will directly increase the overall performance of your vehicle by keeping your intake manifold clean and operating at it's maximum performance.

node.long_desc: Automatic Torque Biasing; Smooth Actuating; Clutchless Operation;California Residents: WARNING"

Manufactured with 1 diameter heavy wall steel tubing, provides " of steel protection between your Jeep any obstacle you come up against. Easily bolts on without drilling. Olympic 4x4 Products are available in your choice of high gloss black, texture black and pink stuff powder coated finishes or unpainted in raw steel for builders."

node.long_desc: Olympic 4x4 products Jeep spare tire carrier in Black powder coat;Made from 1/4 inch steel plate;This Jeep spare tire carrier bolts into the existing mounting holes;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Olympic's Tire Mounts were built after experiencing the O.E.M. tire mount coming apart when larger diameter spare tires were installed. Olympic's Tire Mounts are made from 1/4 inch steel plate. They bolt into the existing mounting holes on the Wrangler's tailgate and into the mounting holes on the Olympic 700 and 701 Tire Swings. The 708 is recommended when larger diameter tires are installed with O.E.M and after market bumpers. Without the 708 installed, larger tires hit the top of the rear bumper. The 707 lowers the tire by 2 inch and is recommended to be used on the Olympic Tire Swing. The factory Wrangler JK tire mount that is installed on the tailgate when you buy a new Jeep is made from pot metal an easily cracks when bumped. The Olympic solid steel Tire Mount is a direct replacement that won't fail.

node.display_name: Afe Power Rock Basher Series Cat-Back Exhaust System
node.long_desc: Up to +9 HP and +8 lbs. x ft. Torque dyno proven max gains;3 mandrel bent, 409 stainless steel tubing for unrestrictive exhaust flow;Includes quality stainless steel band clamps and hardware for a hassle-free installation;Free-flowing stainless steel muffler and aggressive, performance tone;100% hand MIG-welded for strength and durability;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This top-quality, unique cat-back exhaust system defies to be replicated. aFe POWER introduces the all-new 3 stainless steel Rock Basher series exhaust system for the Jeep Wrangler (JL) V6-3.6L. Large, 3" mandrel-bent 409 stainless steel tubing outflows the restrictive OE exhaust to increase horsepower and torque. In testing, the Rock Basher cat-back system resulted in gains up to +9 horsepower and +8 lbs. x ft. of torque, as measured on our in-house dyno. This exhaust delivers the performance gains you expect, and the signature engineered sound of aFe POWER. This cat-back exhaust system has a turn-down tip under the vehicle, before the rear axle, producing a signature exhaust tone. A free-flowing stainless steel muffler is used to absorb high pitch tones producing a powerful sound and unleashing all available horsepower and torque. This exhaust system uses all factory mounting locations, and high quality hardware for a 360-degree sealing surface and hassle-free installation. OE-style bayonet hangers are used to maintain a stable pipe location during high vibration and high heat conditions. The Bayonet tip holds the hanger bushing in place for an OE style fit that does not change with time."

node.sales_desc: aFe's RaceRunner series 2 lift/leveling kit JL offers an affordable suspension package that's capable and comfortable. The RaceRunner shocks are tuned for the perfect balance of on-road comfort and off-road performance with Internal Floating Piston (IFP) valving. Matched with RaceRunner leveling coil springs, this kit delivers increased ride clearance, handling and vehicle control on or off-road."

node.long_desc: 2.0 inch black zinc plated monotube cylinder;CNC machined components are made to the strictest tolerances;Internal Floating Piston (IFP) for simple installation;Multi-seal carrier to ensure zero leakage;Specifically formulated fully synthetic shock fluid;5/8in polished nitro steel shafts for strength and durability;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: aFe Power's RaceRunner Series shocks for the all new Jeep Wrangler JL offers the best in suspension performance at an affordable price. These shocks have been newly redesigned and tuned for the perfect balance of on-road comfort and off-road performance. Built using high quality CNC machined components, race-proven multi-seal technology, and durable urethane bushings, the RaceRunner shocks provide improved handling on the JL at stock height and up to 2in of lift. A 2.0in diameter monotube cylinder with Internal Floating Piston (IFP) design helps to provide a custom quality look that performs on your Jeep JL on the highway or off-road terrain.

node.display_name: MSA Wheels M31 Lok2 Beadlock - Black / Gray
node.long_desc: Beadlock: Yes;Construction: Aluminum;Max Load: 1000 lbs;Finish: Black with Matte Gray Ring;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Love the MSA Wheels M21 Lok beadlock wheel but wish it came in a satin black? You're in luck with the release of the M31 Lok2. After a huge request from their enormous customer base to come out with a full satin black option, MSA Wheels not only listened but gave the new M31 Lok2 a timeless facelift. The M31 Lok2 is available in thick satin black paint and matte grey on the ring. The updated ring is made of durable billet aluminum and engineered with holes to make cleaning up your machine a snap. One of the biggest problems with beadlock wheels is after you tear the trail up, debris builds up behind the ring. The all new M31 Lok2 ring solves this dilemma forever, incorporating twenty specially designed wash out holes to ensure your wheels stay clean on and off the trail. Backed by a full lifetime structural warranty, you bend it or break it, we replace it.

node.long_desc: Beadlock: No;Construction: Aluminum;Max Load: 1000 lbs;Finish: Matte Black;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The M20 Kore incorporates some highlights of our engineering, research, development and design experience. To start, the M20 Kore come standard in our satin black automotive grade paint, which sheds dirt, mud and debris fast, making clean up a snap. The M20 Kore is available in a +0mm offset, allowing for better fitment, performance and stance for both ATVs and UTVs. Not impressed yet? How about 16?? Yes, the M20 Kore is available in the ever popular 147 and also 167 which opens the door for a myriad of tire options, tread patterns and ply ratings. Don't settle, run the best Run MSA Wheels.

node.long_desc: Beadlock: No;Construction: Aluminum;Max Load: 1000 lbs;Finish: Graphite and Machined Graphite;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: We designed the one-piece M28 Ambush in an all new graphite paint color to truly compliment any color machine theme. The split spoke design was specifically engineered to improve deep water performance and keep your clean up time a breeze with multiple wash out holes. Each wheel is painted in a thick coat of our graphite paint to ensure a lifetime of use and beauty. All MSA Offroad Wheels are backed by a full lifetime structural warranty, you bend it, break it or crack it, we replace it.

node.long_desc: Beadlock: No;Construction: Aluminum;Max Load: 1000 lbs;Finish: Matte Black;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Bring on the Battle. No machine destined for battle is truly ready for war without the right set of tools to conquer. The M23 Battle is your one solution to warfare tough design and rugged performance. Engineered using state of the art micro-machining and all-terrain tough satin black automotive grade paint, the M23 Battle is reporting for duty. Pick up a set today in a variety of sizes for your machine. The M23 Battle is available in 12x7, 14x7 and for our sand tire/paddle tire fans an enormous 14x10 (works perfect with our EFX SandSlinger High Performance Sand Tire).

node.long_desc: Beadlock: No;Construction: Aluminum;Max Load: 1000 lbs;Finish: Satin Black / Matte Gray;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The M32 Axe is engineered to improve your performance on any terrain with a lightweight, five spoke, industrial design. Each wheel has a deep lip highlighted with milled rivet accents to protect your spokes from any harsh environment or obstacle. Wrapped in satin black or matte gray finish, your wheels will continue to look new for years thanks to MSA's exclusive automotive grade paint. The M32 Axe has spokes specifically designed to shed mud, dirt and debris with trail proven vent holes so that your machine's horsepower isn't robbed by mud pack. Available in a huge variety of sizes and fitments for any ATV or UTV, the M32 Axe compliments any trim color. Interchangeable center cap and star allow you to swap out accessories for custom colors and optional finishes. This is next level off-road performance.

Available in milled gloss black paint, the M35 Bandit defines a new generation of MSA Offroad Wheels. Available in a variety of fitments for all makes and models of ATVs and UTVs. Finished in satin black automotive grade paint, the M33 Clutch has subtle, milled accents along the lip for just the right amount of raw aluminum highlights. Available in 12x7, 14x7, 15x7 and 16x7, with fitments for any UTV or ATV. Interchangeable center cap and star allow you to swap out accessories for custom colors and optional finishes. Backed by full lifetime structural warranty, the M33 Clutch is your best ally on any terrain, anywhere in the world. This is next level off-road performance.

If you are looking to upgrade your stock coil, or want to compliment the performance of your MSD Blaster Ignition, MSD 5, 6 or 7, the Blaster Coil line is the right choice. All of the Blaster Coils are designed for improved spark output! Special 100:1 windings are used to provide maximum build-up of voltage! These windings are held secure and kept cool in an oil filled metal canister. The tower assembly is molded of durable alkyd material due to its high dielectric characteristics while wide spaced brass primary terminals prevent the possibility of spark. There are several versions of the Blaster Coil available. All of them have the same internal specifications, but have different housings or components. Each Blaster Coil can be used with a stock ignition.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: MSD LSx Trigger Converter To MSD Ignition
node.long_desc: The GM LS Series engines are being built for a lot of different performance and racing applications. You can see good ol? hot rodder ingenuity taking place as racers are running carburetors and even using distributors on these engines! This device plugs into the factory crank sensor of an LS1/LS6 engine and converts the factory trigger signal into a 12-volt square wave signal to trigger an MSD Ignition Control such as a 6 or 7 series ignition control. For racers that are incorporating a front mount distributor to their LS engines, this means you Don't need to run an external crank trigger.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: The Ultimate Trail Riding and GNCC Racing tire;Steers Light, Tracks straight and rides smooth;Exceptional grip, balanced cornering and unbeatable clean-out;Long wearing and highly puncture resistant;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: And now ITP has put an even tighter focus on the exploding woods racing scene with the release of the all-new Holeshot GNCC. node.long_desc: Features a revised profile for greatly improved predictability and side bite;Soft inchworks inch-like rubber compound sets a new standard on hard-packed tracks;Cut seconds off any rider's lap times;2-ply carcass utilizing a sidewall apex design that stiffens the sidewall during side loads without compromising ride quality;Acceleration, braking, cornering and overall balance and feel have all benefited from this new carcass;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: An ideal choice for loose track surfaces, with wider-spaced split knobs for better bite and clean-out;Front MXR6 features a new, longer-wearing tread compound - more motos per tire;Rear MXR6 uses a new reinforced carcass; minimizes stretching while maintaining a flat profile, providing consistent feel and performance;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Highest quality quartz glass and alloy filament for better performance and durability; PIAA's Xtra Technology produces more light with stock power draw; Crisp yellow output improves visibility in inclement weather; 2500K Yellow Color has significantly less glare than white light; Improves visibility in inclement weather;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Plasma Ion coating transforms white light into amber light without diminishing the strength of the beam. Plasma Ion technology allows more than 97% of the light produced by the bulb to pass through, compared to as little as 65% through dyed glass. The long wavelength Plasma Ion beam reduces reflective glare for dramatically increased visibility in snow, rain, and fog.

node.display_name: PIAA Lighting H13/9008 Xtreme White Plus Replacement Bulb
node.long_desc: PIAA's Xtra Technology produces more light with stock power draw;Engineered to optimize output of stock or aftermarket lights;White 4000K color provides best color recognition, contrast, and depth perception. Made with quality components to increase life of the bulb;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Xtreme White Plus is PIAA's best-selling technology. These bulbs will provide a brilliant Xtreme cool white light that will light up road hazards and street signs long before a normal halogen bulb. Xtreme White Plus bulbs are engineered for sustained Performance in applications where a high level of vibration and moisture protection is required. PIAA bulbs are engineered with XTRA Technology for greater Performance per watt compared to the competition. XTRA Technology is achieved when a proprietary gas mixture is combined with an aerospace alloy filament that produces greater light output than its rated power consumption: i.e. 55W=110W

node.display_name: PIAA Lighting H13/9008 Night-Tech Replacement Bulb
node.long_desc: Direct OE replacement upgrade bulb; Highest quality quartz glass and alloy filament for better performance and durability; PIAA's Xtra Technology produces more light with stock power draw; Engineered to optimize output of stock or aftermarket lights; White 3600K color provides better color recognition, contrast, and depth perception; Longest life and DOT/SAE Compliant;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Night Tech line of high output replacement bulbs from PIAA features several advancements in performance, durability and manufacturing. Through the use of a unique mix of gasses including a higher proportion of inert gases as well as a new filament material these bulbs offer up to 90% more light than a conventional bulb with a greater life span. The gases, filament material and dual band coatings on the bulb offer a color temperature in the 3600 Kelvin range for a whiter and brighter light. It also has a longer range (up to 35 meters) output when compared to other replacement bulbs and still retains SAE/DOT compliance.

node.display_name: Road Armor Stealth Series Front Bumpers
node.long_desc: Proudly made in Texas, USA;Hot rolled and laser cut 3/16 inch Plate Steel;1/4-inch-thick internal mounting brackets and gussets;all guard tubing is .120-wall;5 Stage Powdercoat Finish - Highly scratch resistant;Lights are not included;Combat Proven and Trusted by the United States Military, life time guarantee against breakage;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Road Armor is the worlds leading bumper manufacturer dedicated to manufacturing performance products that lead the industry in form, fit, and finish. If some of our designs look familiar to other knockoff competitors products;they should. We were the first to use a high-angle faceting approach to design our products, and with the release of our Stealth line of bumpers we have lead the industry since 2002. Having produced over 10,000 winch bumpers in our careers we are now building a more successful company than ever dedicated to 100% customer satisfaction. Using the latest in parametric 3D CAD software and state-of-the-art equipment we offer products that are unrivaled in design as well as fit and finish, and at the most competitive prices. Check out the competition, you won't find a better product for your money.

node.display_name: Dana Spicer Dana 60 4.88 Ratio Ring and Pinions
node.long_desc: All Dana Spicer ring gear and pinion sets are designed and tested to meet original equipment specifications;Spicer gearing is manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated to precision, so you can count on optimum set-up and mating of the gears;Dana Spicer has conducted aggressive dynamometer tests to ensure exceptional performance of all of their genuine Spicer gearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Dana Spicer ring and pinions are the same high-quality gears that originally came in your Dana axle from the factory They're available in the most popular performance and replacement ratios. The ring and pinion gears are painstakingly designed and tested just like the original, which means smooth, reliable performance. They're built to the latest high-tolerance specifications, while also featuring a premium heat treating process that improves strength and durability. Optimal tooth profiles are also employed, which keeps operation both smooth and quiet.

When you purchase genuine Spicer ring and pinion gear sets, you can be confident the ring and pinion set will meet or exceed the exact Dana standards that original equipment manufacturers have relied upon for more than a hundred years.

The ring and pinions are manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated, so you can count on properly matched sets for optimal set-up and mesh.

Remember: Non-genuine replacement parts are usually not manufactured to the same standards, which can cost you more in the long run. When you purchase gearing with the Spicer name, you can rest assured that you are getting quality product that's engineered to keep your vehicle on the road. Reduce your downtime and cost with genuine Spicer OE products.

node.long_desc: Type Of System: cat back;Retains Catalytic Converter: yes;Type Of Material: stainless;Exhaust Tip: stainless steel;Muffler Included: yes;Muffler Type: straight through;Muffler Material: stainless steel;reuses factory hangers;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Banks Heavy-Duty Stainless Steel Monster Exhaust system cuts back pressure up to 98% and flows up to 176% better than stock. The streamlined intermediate pipe and tailpipe are formed of stainless, heavy-wall tubing with constant-diameter bends to maximize airflow and lower exhaust gas temps.

node.long_desc: Improves airflow from the intercooler;Raises boost without increasing turbine drivepressure;Larger & less restrictive than stock intake;Improves flow of oxygen-rich air into cylinders;Quicker throttle response;Out-boosts the competition by up to 56.9%;Up to six 1/8 inch NPT ports;Includes 3-1/2 inch mandrel-bent boost tube;Delivers instant torque;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Monster-Ram improves airflow from the intercooler. Raises boost without increasing backpressure at the turbine. Result: a more responsive, fuel-efficient engine. Up to six 1/8 inch NPT ports for flexibility! At Banks Power, just enough is never enough when it comes to engine airflow. Maximum power, performance and efficiency are the ultimate goals, but to make it all happen the engine has to breathe freely and without needless restrictions. Finding ways to pump your engine full of cooler, denser air has always been the key. Our High-Ram intakes have always whipped the competition. Our new Monster-Ram flat-out destroys it. Utilizing the latest in electronic computational fluid-dynamic technology, tested on the flow bench as well as on the dyno, and finally proven in the real world where the rubber meets the road, Monster-Ram is a beast that only Banks could have unleashed. A simple, direct-replacement casting, Monster-Ram is instant power, performance and acceleration gratification. The factory inlet is cramped and angular compared to Banks' larger, streamlined cast-metal Monster-Ram. It's the perfect upgrade whether you're just starting out or working to build a serious, purpose-built machine. And with up to six ports for water/meth/propane/nitrous injection (or pressure/temp. sensors), the sky's the limit for performance expandability. Monster-Ram is CNC port-matched to the stock heater as well as the optional Banks Billet Intake Grid Heater Delete spacer. Includes 3-1/2 inch mandrel-bent boost tube. With up to six ports for water/meth/propane/nitrous injection (or pressure/temp. sensors), the sky's the limit for Monster-Ram's performance expandability.

node.display_name: Banks Power Banks iQ Man-Machine Interface
node.long_desc: Flash Compatible; w/Dynafact;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: No other device on the market can match what we've put into the Banks iQ. This powerful micro-computer lets you know the inner workings of your vehicle's ECU letting you see what's beyond your dashboard gauges. You select what you want to see and how you want to see it. Set alarms, adjust gauge colors, read and clear codes, log data, and find out how quick your vehicle really is. You'll find yourself using the host of useful built-in tools in your daily life. You'll listen to your favorite tunes, watch videos, play games, review your Microsoft Office documents and more. It's PC power that fits in the palm of your hand, and with a rechargeable battery you can take it with you wherever you go. Compared to Banks iQ, other vehicle interfaces on the market are one-dimensional toys with an umbilical cord to your dashboard.

node.display_name: Banks Power Banks Billet Torque Converters
node.long_desc: Banks Billet Torque Converter;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Three-friction-element clutch system and indestructible billet steel cover maintain solid contact without flexing, allowing the Banks Billet Torque Converter to triple the torque capacity of stock (1800 lb-ft vs. 600 lb-ft). It's tough enough for racing! And it cuts nearly one second off the 0-60 mph acceleration time. Because the lockup clutch is slip-resistant, transmission fluid temperatures stay cooler and transmission life is prolonged. Built for precision, performance and durability, the Banks Billet Torque Converter is designed to properly match the torque band to deliver the maximum power to the wheels. It's a smart upgrade for trucks modified for increased performance. The entire assembly is balanced and blueprinted for ultimate performance and smoothness.

node.long_desc: Bestop's Sailcloth Replace-a-Top soft top for Jeeps are 50% quieter than a traditional Replace-a-tops;Requires factory original hardware in good condition;Kits include the soft top fabric, window panels and door skins (where applicable);Jeep soft top kits with replacement doors skins attach over factory original door frames;All Bestop Wrangler soft top parts can be replaced individually, extending the value of your purchase;Two-year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Sailcloth Replace-a-tops takes the award-winning formula of Replace-a-top, and adds in heavier sailcloth fabric. Sailcloth tops are the quietest soft tops on the market. The secret to this Jeep soft top lies in the unique multi-ply Sailcloth fabric. Each ply plays a different role, but together they reflect road sounds, absorb wind noise, and prevent buffeting to create a silencing effect that absolutely must be heard to be believed.

The Bestop Replace-a-top is the only replacement top featuring the patented Belt Rail attachment system and is designed to fit right over the factory hardware for easy installation and returns to its original shape and tautness. The Replace-a-top also features factory-spec velcro, thread, webbing, and door seals. Plus oversized zippers, DOT approved windows, and a rear attachment system that lets you open your tailgate without having to open your rear window. The Replace-a-top consists of fabric only and fit only factory-original hardware.

node.long_desc: Secure to sport bar uprights for convenient yet attractive storage;Quickly straps to sport bars using hook and loop strips;Fabric is mildew-resistant;Outer accessories pockets provide easy access to frequently used items;Sold individually;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: RoughRider? Saddle Bags utilize what would otherwise be wasted space. They are custom designed to fit the sport bar opening, providing convenient storage. Attached with rugged hook and loop straps, these handy pouches stay fastened through the bumpiest four-wheeling and they also convert to a shoulder strap duffle bag.

node.long_desc: Custom designed to fit over factory original seats Bestop's Seat Covers Keep your seats looking new and protects them from rips and stains;UV inhibitors and color stabilizers resist sunlight fading, and keeps your covers looking new while helping preserve the vehicle resale value;Manufactured to be the best-fitting, best-looking, most durable seat covers Bestop has ever offered with a strap and buckle system for a secure and easy installation;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
As you enjoy the open-air experience, your seats are suffering. Ultraviolet light, dust, mud, waterall that stuff, will cause permanent damage. Protect or make presentable all the seats in your Wrangler or CJ. These Custom Seat Covers are so easy to install (no tools required) that in a mere 10 minutes you can have them on or offwhatever the need may be. The fit is tight (no shifting or bunching) and doesn't inhibit any seat functions.

Bestop has been designing and manufacturing seat covers for Jeeps for a very long time. Bestop puts its best fabric experts to work on making these the best-fitting, best-looking, most durable seat covers we've ever offered. Installation requires no drilling or cutting.

Each Bestop Seat Cover comes complete with instructions and all the necessary hardware.

node.sales_desc: Bestop's covered all the angles. Bestop's innovative fastback styling has made Trektop NX the best selling soft top on the market today. Trektop NX is truly a complete soft top but doesn't need all the frame hardware and bows of traditional soft top designs. It takes advantage of the Wrangler's sport bars to give it shape and support for an easier installation. And there's an added bonus to the Trektop NX - just zip out the windows and it transforms into a Safari Bikini Top.

node.sales_desc:
Your original soft top can get damaged or begin to show its age after all those years battling the sun and weather. Replace-a-top takes advantage of your still-good factory hardware, and gives you all new fabric and windows without having to replace your existing frames and hardware. It's the most economical way to make your top look new again.

The Bestop Replace-a-top is the only replacement top featuring the patented Belt Rail attachment system and American fabric specially constructed to stretch for easy installation then return to its original shape for tautness. The Replace-a-top also features factory-spec velcro, thread, webbing, and door seals. Plus oversized zippers, DOT approved windows, and a rear attachment system that lets you open your tailgate without having to open your rear window. The Replace-a-top consists of fabric only and fit only factory-original hardware.

node.display_name: Bestop PowerBoard NX Automatic Running Boards
node.long_desc: Extends down automatically when door opens;Steps descend up to six inches;600lb load capacity PER SIDE;6.25 inch extra wide step;Black with wireless controllers;Integrated light kit;Climate and salt spray tested to operate in any climate;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: PowerBoard NX has all the same features as PowerBoard, PLUS we've added patent pending wireless technology. These control the door functions with no need to tap into the factory wires. They remotely signal the boards to retract and drop instantly when the doors open and shut. The install time and complexity is greatly reduced, and there's no chance for conflicts with other aftermarket wiring, like security systems and remote starts. Because of the WiFi components, PowerBoard NX installs in less time than the original PowerBoards, and for the first time, does not require any contact with the interior of the vehicle. This means no door panels, kick panels, kick plates or carpets, are touched; no cutting, splicing or tapping in to the complicated wiring harness.

node.sales_desc: BMF Wheels has created a truly unique and performance-driven line of wheels for the off-road and lifted truck wheel enthusiast. BMF Wheels features an innovative fusion of forged wheel styling with cast wheel technology. BMF truck wheels are industry leading in design, strength and fitment. All BMF wheels feature aggressive and bold designs for 4x4 rims and truck wheels with chrome and ?Death Metal? black finishes. Every wheel is manufactured using a proprietary multi-axis CNC machining process. These ground-breaking innovations produce a true three-dimensional look that is second to none for wheels and custom rims. All BMF custom truck wheels are engineered to meet OE specifications and are all TPMS sensor compatible.

node.sales_desc: We have desiged the coolest Chase Rack on the market today. This attractive yet functional rack system is loaded with features. It gives the race look of a trophy truck, has provision for a 40 inch dual LED light bar up front and 4 rear facing lights. Perfect for a dust light, cargo lights and back up lights. The Body Armor Chase Rack features a tubular A-frame structure with a center brace over the cab. This structure provides strength and rigidity for the abuse in the desert. There is also an integrated basket over the cab for a gear bag or two. You can add accessories like a bed mounted tire mount, saddle can brackets for extra gas cans. When all of the accessories are added to the Chase Rack you can carry up to 6 Roto-pax cans (water and fuel), carry a 37 inch tall tire plus a Hi-Lift jack and still have room to load two dirt bikes. Installation requires drilling into the bed caps. Assembly is required, does not require truck freight. Manufactured in the USA.

node.long_desc: One size fits all truck beds: full size, mid size and compact;Weatherproof tarp is cut, tear, and abrasion resistant;Features tape sealed seams;Includes: weatherproof cargo net, (12) hooks, stuff sack and set up guide;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: No more tangled cargo nets and bulky landscape tarps! The Rightline Gear Weatherproof Cargo Net secures truck bed cargo while keeping it dry. This innovative product attaches a bungee-style cargo net to a tough lightweight tarp, eliminating tangling of the net. Angled attachment points allow the cargo net to independently stretch in all directions and relocatable hooks adjust the size and tension of the net. The product folds down into a small stuff sack that can be stored behind or beneath the truck's seats. The Weatherproof Cargo Net also works great on utility trailers.

node.sales_desc: Smittybilt offers a variety of OE-style replacement soft top parts for the 07-18 Jeep Wrangler, for a fraction of the cost from the OE Dealer. If you've damaged your bow assembly or just need door surrounds for your Wrangler, you can count on Smittybilt to get your soft top back to its OE-quality.

Our EASY 3-LINK KIT is the simplest way to get your links done. This kit is intended for axles without a front truss. The heat and cryogenically treated chromoly rod ends are the strongest and longest lasting on the market. The included tube adapters feature machined WRENCH FLATS for easy adjustments and tightening and conform to the outer diameter of the tubing it welds to. The included stainless steel high misalignment spacers allow for maximum articulation in the rod end.

node.long_desc: Utilizes the wireless charging standard, Qi to charge your phones without cables;Does not interfere with your vehicle's Bluetooth functionality while using your infotainment system;Charge's your phone to 100% battery and tapers off to avoid overcharging;Features an LED light that lets you know when your phone is charging and when it is full;A seamless install gives the charging mat a factory-look without any unsightly cables;The non-slip charging mat holds your phone securely in place while driving;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Brandmotion's FreedomCharge systems use the wireless charging standard, Qi, to keep your phone going without the hassle of plugging it in. This type of charging has taken off with use in homes, vehicles, and is now used by Apple in the new iPhone 8 and iPhone X. It works by using inductive charging technology to allow your smartphone to charge without connecting a charger. No longer will you have to search for your charger and orient it the correct way just to plug in your phone. Add a new level of convenience to your car and keep your eyes on the road, instead of fumbling with a tangled mess of cords.

node.long_desc: Available in bare steel or black powder coat finish;Unique, double pivot design;Offers superior strength;Capable of handling the weight of up to a 42 spare tire;Oversized spindle and heavy-gauge construction;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Carrying a spare tire on your Jeep is no small task. Most tire carriers rattle and shake and are susceptible to breaking with oversized aftermarket tires. The Hauk Offroad tire carrier system has a unique, double pivot design that offers superior strength and is capable of handling the weight of up to a 42 tire. The oversized spindle and heavy-gauge construction means that it will hold up and last for years of trail and street abuse."

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 28 to 44 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 17 inch diameter;All Treads are the famous TSL (Three Stage Lug) design Tires;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Super Swamper TSL with the patented TSL tread design offers unsurpassed traction under the toughest of conditions. Nine years of developing and testing produced the ultimate tire tread design. Short, intermediate and long massive lugs are uniquely arranged, each proportioned and spaced to bite quickly and to self-clean rapidly. The overall design gives today's on-and-off-road driver a tire that is both directionally and laterally stable; unmatched in performance. This is an extremely aggressive design that requires strict attention to air pressure when run on the highway. **TREAD DESIGN MAY DIFFER BY SIZE**

Any off-roader knows that tires can make a huge difference between safely driving on a trail and not. For mud boggers, they're even more important. Without features like superior traction and tread cleaning, it's easy to get stuck while the competition powers ahead to the finish line. But there is a tire that has both those advantages and more: the legendary Super Swamper TSL. Sure, you could buy this tire probably anywhere, but 4 Wheel Parts offers the best value for your money. With everyday low prices, fast shipping and world-class service, we're your best destination for Super Swamper mud tires.

Your Destination for Super Swamper Tires
You may notice that we called Super Swamper truck tires legendary. They're one of the top picks among professional mud boggers for many reasons. Diligent engineering and design results in a unique tire tread pattern with short, intermediate and long massive lugs. Super Swamper TSL tires bite soft ground quickly, but their tread also self-cleans to maintain consistent traction on even the sloppiest mud.

Now that you know how excellent Super Swampers are, it's time to put them on your vehicle. With our six distribution centers nationwide, we ship orders quickly and efficiently. Shop 4WP for your Super Swamper tires and get them delivered right to your door. Want them faster? Choose our"

node.display_name: Super Swamper TrXus STS Bias Tires
node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 33 to 44 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 20 inch diameter;All Treads are the famous TSL (Three Stage Lug) design Tires;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: All Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The TrXus STS, the STS stands for Three Stage Sidewall, is a new concept in all terrain tires. These tires are not intended to be a substitute for the Super Swamper or Bogger tires but a tire for you if you spend a lot of time on the street. Besides working so well on the street it has good off road performance and excels in snow and sand. It is also very much at home in the rocks and will impress anyone with its all-around performance. This tire is going to set a new standard in the all-terrain category.

node.sales_desc: The Super Swamper TSL /ATV is the ATV tire designed with absolute performance in mind. A combination of hot performance in slushy conditions while giving excellent grip on packed terrain and a smooth ride as well. The lateral traction of the Super Swamper TSL/ATV has been reduced to allow the tire to skid sideways which decreases the chances of rollover in tight turns. This is the tire that opened up a whole new world to the ATV enthusiast.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 31 to 54 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 15 to 22 inch diameter;All Treads are the famous TSL (Three Stage Lug) design Tires;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: Mud Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Super Swamper Bogger is built primarily for the professional mud Bogger. The tire is versatile, D.O.T. approved and street legal. Easy to modify for the cut, open, and pro stock classes. A new design for a new generation of competition performance. With its unmistakable looks, the Super Swamper Bogger gives any vehicle a distinctive look.

You're not afraid to get down and dirty. There's nothing that quite gets your blood pumping and your mind into sharp focus like conquering large swaths of deep mud in your 4x4. Once your wheels hit mud, you need to know that your tires are tough enough to make it to the other side. 4 Wheel Parts has a huge inventory of Super Swamper Boggers, built tough to handle the muddiest and most challenging trails.

The Best Bogger Tires

Interco is a leading producer of high-performance tires for high-octane motorsports. Designed for professional mud boggers, its TSL Boggers combine durability and an aggressive design to handle anything the terrain throws at your vehicle. TSL stands for three-stage lug, an exclusive design patented by Interco. Built into a directional tread pattern, Interco's TSL combines large lugs with side biters and clean-out lines. This lug design is expertly engineered to deliver the perfect combination of bite and clean-out, resulting in exceptional traction on even the muddiest trails. Because these Super Swamper tires are both DOT approved and street legal, they're also incredibly versatile. You don't have to swap out your wheels for quick runs onto paved roads.

Keep Your Wheels Rolling

4 Wheel Parts offers the best selection of tires for Jeeps and trucks, but we're also your source for performance parts, braking system components, interior and exterior accessories, lighting, suspension mods, winches, towing"

node.sales_desc: The Vampire steps away from all other ATV tires. The Super Swamper TSL/Vampire is as rugged as they come. The deep lugs give longer tread life with the 43/32nds of tread depth and unsurpassed forward, reverse and lateral traction. The Vampires are so strong they continue to run under most load conditions even when punctured. As long as the Vampire does not become unseated from the rim the tire will almost always get you back... even without air.

Tires are one of the most important parts of off-roading, especially if you want to be able to take your truck anywhere. Not only do you need to make sure your tires are in good shape, you need to make sure you have tires that are equipped to handle the tough terrain. When it comes to off-road tires, it's hard to beat the Super Swamper TSL tires at 4 Wheel Parts. These Super Swamper tires are designed with deep tread that gives you grip when you need it most, no matter how tough of terrain you're on.

Off-Road Ready

Every time you take your truck or Jeep off-road, you're accepting the risk of getting stuck in the woods somewhere. You never know when you're going to have a problem with your vehicle, but a good set of Super Swamper TSL SX tires ensures your tires won't be at fault. If you want to be ready for every off-road ride, these tires are a good place to start.

A Tall Order

When you're shopping for tires for Jeeps and trucks, you have to look for different features than you need in standard tires. You want your truck tires to be able to stand up to tough terrain and last a long time, so it's crucial to make sure you're buying tires that are designed to handle off-road terrain without breaking down.

The Right Choice

If you are an off-road enthusiast, you know the importance a good set of tires means. From providing some lift to better avoid obstacles to gaining needed tread to handle muddy or slippery conditions, replacing tire is one of the best ways to beef up your ride. When its time to choose which are the right ones, count on 4 Wheel Parts to have the Super Swamper tires to fit your needs.

Choosing the Right Tires
When it comes to choosing your new IROK tires, size does matter. The bigger you go, the added components that will be needed, such as wheels and wheel spacers. 4 Wheel Parts carries an array of size options up to 39.5 inches. Load range is also a key consideration. The higher the range, the heavier the load can be. If you plan on maximizing your vehicle, a large range is an ideal option. Available options include C, D and E, with the latter providing a max load of 3,460 pounds.

Competitive Prices
While shopping for Super Swamper IROK tires can be fun, you also know that it will be an investment. 4 Wheel Parts understands how eager you are to get back on the road without breaking the bank. That is why we offer a price match guarantee on every part we sell.

node.long_desc: Bestop's Sunrider Soft top for jeeps gives you the option to let the sunshine in or keep the rain out.The Bestop invented Belt-Rail Jeep Soft Top attachment system allows fast, easy installation;Adjustable hardware bows let you keep fabric smooth and taut;Tailgate bar allows tailgate to open without unzipping the rear window for trouble-free access;Use existing factory full steel hard doors, or use with a variety of optional Bestop door kits, sold separately;Complete replacement CJ7 and Wrangler soft top includes frame hardware, soft top fabric and clear 30-mil windows;Two-year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Bestop Sunrider allows you to peel the top back and let the sun shine in. Perfect for those days of constantly changing weather conditions, or, you can fold the entire top back for the true open-air driving experience. The Sunrider features single-slide zippers on the quarter panel window for easy removal, a separate two-latch header piece that requires minimal or no drilling, a dual zipper on the rear window allowing easier access and can be used with any door configuration.

Dana Spicer Dana 60 4.56 Ratio Ring and Pinions
node.long_desc: All Dana Spicer ring gear and pinion sets are designed and tested to meet original equipment specifications;Spicer gearing is manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated to precision, so you can count on optimum set-up and mating of the gears;Dana Spicer has conducted aggressive dynamometer tests to ensure exceptional performance of all of their genuine Spicer gearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Dana Spicer ring and pinions are the same high-quality gears that originally came in your Dana axle from the factory They're available in the most popular performance and replacement ratios. The ring and pinion gears are painstakingly designed and tested just like the original, which means smooth, reliable performance. They're built to the latest high-tolerance specifications, while also featuring a premium heat treating process that improves strength and durability. Optimal tooth profiles are also employed, which keeps operation both smooth and quiet.

When you purchase genuine Spicer ring and pinion gear sets, you can be confident the ring and pinion set will meet or exceed the exact Dana standards that original equipment manufacturers have relied upon for more than a hundred years.

The ring and pinions are manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated, so you can count on properly matched sets for optimal set-up and mesh.

Remember: Non-genuine replacement parts are usually not manufactured to the same standards, which can cost you more in the long run. When you purchase gearing with the Spicer name, you can rest assured that you are getting quality product that's engineered to keep your vehicle on the road. Reduce your downtime and cost with genuine Spicer OE products.

node.display_name: Dana Spicer Dana 60 4.10 Ratio Ring and Pinions
node.long_desc: All Dana Spicer ring gear and pinion sets are designed and tested to meet original equipment specifications;Spicer gearing is manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated to precision, so you can count on optimum set-up and mating of the gears;Dana Spicer has conducted aggressive dynamometer tests to ensure exceptional performance of all of their genuine Spicer gearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Dana Spicer ring and pinions are the same high-quality gears that originally came in your Dana axle from the factory They're available in the most popular performance and replacement ratios. The ring and pinion gears are painstakingly designed and tested just like the original, which means smooth, reliable performance. They're built to the latest high-tolerance specifications, while also featuring a premium heat treating process that improves strength and durability. Optimal tooth profiles are also employed, which keeps operation both smooth and quiet.

When you purchase genuine Spicer ring and pinion gear sets, you can be confident the ring and pinion set will meet or exceed the exact Dana standards that original equipment manufacturers have relied upon for more than a hundred years.

The ring and pinions are manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated, so you can count on properly matched sets for optimal set-up and mesh.

Remember: Non-genuine replacement parts are usually not manufactured to the same standards, which can cost you more in the long run. When you purchase gearing with the Spicer name, you can rest assured that you are getting quality product that's engineered to keep your vehicle on the road. Reduce your downtime and cost with genuine Spicer OE products.

node.sales_desc: KC Cyclone LED is a multi-functional and compact auxiliary LED lighting solution. Originally designed for Off Road Racers as an interior dome light, the Cyclone LED light has evolved into an all purpose light for rock crawling, engine bays, wheel wells and an infinite amount of off road lighting applications. node.display_name: KC HiLites Daylighter Halogen Driving Lights
node.long_desc: 130 watt;Sold individually or pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Our shock mounted lights began with the famous KC Daylighter that we invented and patented in 1972. Not only does the Daylighter use a heavy-duty rubber gasket (bulb holder) that isolates the lens, reflector, and bulb from the metal housing and elements of weather, but it also includes our patented shock mounting system. The KC HiLiTES shock mounting system was developed as a way to isolate the lamp unit from the mounting bracket or surface to which the light is mounted. This system successfully reduces lamp failure due to vibration and has been proven through the extremes of off road racing. Now, the shock mount system has been updated from the original to require no extra drilling.

node.long_desc: Available in 2x 3 or 3"x 3' recovery strap;31,200 lb. or 38,000 lb. rating;Made of heavy-duty polyester webbing;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: At Factor 55 we have been using a version of our custom ultra short flat straps for years to assist in a variety of useful vehicle recovery applications. These short straps are not constructed like typical recovery/snatch straps. The Shorty Straps are not designed to store energy from stretch. They are designed to serve as a versatile short soft link to attach to vehicles and are constructed of an ultra low stretch (low energy storage) polyester, not high stretch nylon like typical snatch straps. The applications vary from easily attaching to vehicles that are not equipped with recovery points, to using your winch and Shorty Strap to field repair/straighten bent steering components like tie rods and drag links. The inherit flat shape of the straps prevent the straps from rolling and twisting when attached to tubular shapes like bumper stingers, steering components, and nerf bars. We prefer flat straps over round ropes for this reason. Even polyester webbing materials retain a small element of material stretch and since the total energy stored is a function of the % of stretch and the overall length of the strap, we have designed the strap to be as short as possible but still retain the necessary webbing overlap and stitch count necessary for the rated loads. The overall length of the Shorty Straps is 3 feet, and this is reduced to only 1.5 feet long when used in the common basket configuration. Low stretch/energy storage equates to less recoil energy during a possible component failure. The strap is manufactured in the USA to Factor 55 specifications by the Certified Sling Corporation, the parent company to the well known Bubba Rope Company.

node.long_desc: Effectively measures the tongue weight of your towing load;Ensures that your vehicle is balanced properly and is safe to tow
node.sales_desc: Weigh Safe trailer hitches have a built-in scale to measure tongue weight to ensure safe towing. The Weigh Safe Drop Hitch effectively measures the tongue weight of your towing load, ensuring that your vehicle is balanced properly and is safe to tow. Pressure on the ball sends a reading to the built-in scale that measures tongue weight (lbs.) For proper towing tongue weight should be no less than 10 percent of gross trailer weight (GTW) and no more than 15 percent. For example, tongue weight for a 10,000 pound trailer should be no less than 1000lbs. and no more than 1500lbs.

Each can comes with a safety spout attached and also has an adapter for vehicles with smaller filler receivers. Manufactured from 0.9mm Cold Rolled Steel ( DC 04 EN 10130). Dual pan construction. Unique wide channel breather for better smoother pouring. Seam welded for extra strength. Three Handle Configuration. Leakproof Bayonet Closure. Locking pin in cap. node.display_name: Tough Stuff EZ-Flip License Plate Brackets
node.long_desc: Mounts to your winch roller fairlead;Stainless steel construction;Fits 8-3/4 inch winch roller fairleads;Does not fit Smittybilt roller fairleads;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Looking for a place to mount your license plate that looks right after installing your new winch? Had a winch for a while and worry about losing your front license plate on the trail?
The EZ-Flip license plate bracket easily mounts on your winch roller fairlead. Once upright, corrosion resistant stainless steel springs hold it in place. After winch use, simply lower the plate and snap the clips onto the rollers.
Sturdy stainless steel construction encompasses both the bracket and hardware. Marine grade clips provide rattle free connection to the rollers.
Fits all winch roller fairleads with front rollers approx. 8-3/4 center to center. Includes all current full size roller fairleads supplied by Warn, Ramsey and Mile-Maker.(Does not work with Smittybilt Rollerf Fairleads)"
